resources.string:
This App is a sample to show how DataService library work.

 What is considered in this program:
 - Androidx
 - MVP (Model View Presenter)
 - Realm for local database
 - OkHttp for Android 5.0+ (API 21+)
 - Volly lib for Android API -21

 to more information visit www.appafzar.com

 created by A.hashemi 2020-06-27
 phone: (+98)9127500206

\
This DataService library support:
 minSdkVersion 15
 targetSdkVersion 29
